name: Snowmageddon (PenguinoProductions)
description:
###MADE FOR VIRTUS WINTER GAME JAM###

Survive the never ending snow fall. Survive for longer than anyone else and receive absolutely no prize (okay maybe bragging rights). Or sabotage your opponents by picking up snowballs and throwing them at them.

Base controls:

  • 'w,a,s,d'  = movement
  • 'e' for action (pickup, throw, readyup)
  • 'space' for run

Things I might add in the future:

  • lobby and main start menus etc
  • stamina bar for run
